nodes.text: Pol Tamso was a male Human lieutenant of the Galactic Republic living on Balmorra during the Galactic War along with his brother Arick. During the Battle of Balmorra Pol was stationed at the Lower Sundari Outpost of the Sundari Flatlands, where he asked a passing Republic citizen to locate Arick at the Sundari Research Grounds facility, as he had not heard from him for some time.
Pol Tamso appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as an NPC on Balmorra, involved in a Heroic quest "Colicoid Massacre."
